news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Intelligent Growth Solutions achieved the Silver Award in the Employer Recognition Scheme, marking a significant recognition for its contributions and performance. This accolade reflects the company's commitment to excellence and its status in the industry.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Intelligent Growth Solutions, Burro, GrowFlux, Regrow Ag, TeleSense, and Sound Agriculture operate in the agricultural technology sector. Burro, GrowFlux, Regrow Ag, TeleSense, and Sound Agriculture all focus on providing innovative technology solutions to improve farming practices, with an emphasis on automation, environmental monitoring, and crop enhancement.

research_insight_text_link.research_insight_description: Intelligent Growth Solutions is focused on innovations in controlled environment agriculture. They have developed an improved siphon for growth trays, enhancing fluid dynamics for plant cultivation. Their ventilation and lighting device integrates with a common manifold, optimizing indoor agriculture conditions. A controllable power and lighting system has been designed for the automatic arrangement and control of LED lighting and other devices. They've also created an irrigation system for vertical growth towers, ensuring efficient water delivery. Lastly, their electrical support system distributes three-phase power, facilitating energy management. These advancements collectively support robust growth systems and energy efficiency in controlled environments.

overview_description.description: IGS makes platforms that deliver ideal climates for plants and people, based upon a culture of continuous innovation, brilliant, simple design and a refusal to accept conventional technical thinking.

properties.growth_insight_description: Intelligent Growth Solutions has transitioned from a research project in Scotland to establishing global Giga Farms. One such GigaFarm in the desert is capable of producing 3 million kilograms of food.

product.name: Growth Towers
product.description: A fully-automated, vertical farming system that controls lighting, water, energy, and nutrient delivery to create an optimal growing environment year-round.

product.name: TCEA (Total Controlled Environment Agriculture)
product.description: A technology that uses artificial lighting, hydroponics, and other systems to fully control temperature, humidity, and other environmental factors for optimal plant growth.
